story.label: Our Story
story.title: From Humble Beginnings to Global Leadership
story.p1: Founded in 1998 by a team of industry veterans, Broroma began as a small trading company with a simple mission: to bridge the gap between quality pipe manufacturers and businesses in need of reliable supply.
story.p2: What started in a modest office in Houston has grown into a global operation spanning five continents. Our success is built on unwavering commitment to quality, transparency, and customer satisfaction.
story.p3: Today, we serve over 500 clients worldwide, from small construction firms to major oil and gas corporations. Our network includes certified suppliers across Asia, Europe, and the Americas, ensuring we can meet any specification or volume requirement.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the minimum order quantity?
faq.a1: Minimum order quantities vary by product type and supplier. For standard products, we typically work with MOQs starting from 5 metric tons. For specialty items, we can accommodate smaller quantities with adjusted pricing.
faq.q2: How long does shipping typically take?
faq.a2: Shipping times depend on the origin and destination. Sea freight from Asia to North America typically takes 25-35 days. We also offer expedited air freight options for urgent requirements.
faq.q3: Do you provide Mill Test Certificates?
faq.a3: Yes, all products come with original Mill Test Certificates (MTCs) documenting chemical composition, mechanical properties, and test results as per relevant standards.
faq.q4: What payment terms do you offer?
faq.a4: We offer flexible payment terms including Letter of Credit (L/C), Telegraphic Transfer (T/T), and Documentary Collection. Terms are tailored based on order value and customer relationship.
